articles.title: Video: Man who said he was 'almost a school shooter' reveals what stopped him - CNN Video
articles.description: Aaron Stark, who penned a letter titled "I was almost a school shooter," joins CNN's Pamela Brown to react to some of the recent mass shootings in the US, and discusses the mindset behind mass shootings.

articles.title: Watch: 'When the bombing starts, I don't know where to hide': Ukrainian living on the frontlines - CNN Video
articles.description: More than forty towns and villages in the Donbas region have come under attack in the last 24 hours, as the Russians push into the Donetsk region. CNN's Alex Marquardt  is in Kharkiv to see how the most vulnerable live on the front line of the Russian invasio…

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Will the Nord Stream 1 pipeline ever come back online?
articles.description: Since the West hit Russia with bruising sanctions following its invasion of Ukraine, a frightening question has loomed: What if Russia turns off natural gas to Europe?

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, Tim Lister, Yulia Kesaieva and Tara John, CNN
articles.title: Russian strike on residential building kills 29 in eastern Ukraine, officials say
articles.description: At least 29 people have been confirmed dead after a Russian strike hit an apartment block in the Donetsk region of eastern Ukraine over the weekend, Ukrainian officials said Monday.
articles.content:
(CNN)At least29 people have been confirmed dead after a Russian strike hit an apartment block in the Donetsk region of eastern Ukraine over the weekend, Ukrainian officials said Monday.

articles.author: Tim Lister and Petro Zadorozhnyy, CNN
articles.title: Ukraine's harvest becomes the new battlefield, as fires blacken its arable heartlands
articles.description: Across Ukraine, in the shimmering heat, one sight is becoming familiar this summer: Combine harvesters sweeping across fields of grain in a race against fast-spreading fires.

articles.author: By Kathleen Magramo, Andrew Raine, Jack Guy and Ed Upright, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's invasion of Ukraine
articles.description: Ukraine has launched a counteroffensive against Russian troops in the southern regions of Kherson and Zaporizhzhia. Follow here for live updates

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The big win the January 6 committee has already scored
articles.description: Whether or not Donald Trump ends up facing criminal charges, the House committee probing the US Capitol insurrection has scored a critical win over the ex-President by thwarting his effort to cover up the true horror of that day of infamy.

articles.author: Nectar Gan, CNN
articles.title: China crushes mass protest by bank depositors demanding their life savings back
articles.description: Chinese authorities on Sunday violently dispersed a peaceful protest by hundreds of depositors, who sought in vain to demand their life savings back from banks that have run into a deepening cash crisis.

articles.title: Expert explains how to protect yourself against the recent Covid surges
articles.description: The much-awaited summer lull in coronavirus cases doesn't appear to be happening. CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen offers her insights about what precautions to take as infections continue to increase in much of the United States.
